document.heading: ABLE Program Trust Establishment Act of 2015

history.narrative: Law 21-61, the “ABLE Program Trust Establishment Act of 2015” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 21-252. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Oct. 2, 2015, and Nov. 3, 2015, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Nov. 23, 2015, it was assigned Act No. 21-203 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 21-61 became effective February 2, 2016.
